nodes.text: The Kylan-15 blaster rifle was a blaster rifle produced by the SoroSuub Corporation.

It was most notably used by the military unit Churhee's Riflemen. The Riflemen used a modified version of the Kylan-15 created by their leader Vlaydm Churhee. The modifications included a collapsible stock, an advanced sniping scope, and a silencer.
